mappings.notes: JointState represents a named joint (robot component). Map to Asset as a robot sub-component with live position data.
BatteryState maps to Asset for battery health tracking in the Portarium cockpit.
ROS 2 action goal status maps to a Portarium Task lifecycle (ACCEPTED→EXECUTING→SUCCEEDED/ABORTED/CANCELED).
Odometry is a telemetry stream; no canonical object match. Reference externally for cockpit display.
OccupancyGrid (map) is a domain-specific artefact; treated as an ExternalObjectRef linked from a mission Task.
Planned path is a transient planning artefact. Surfaced in the cockpit as an ExternalObjectRef for visualisation.
A timestamped pose (current robot location). Used as a reference in Task goals and telemetry.
Diagnostic status items are hardware health records; surfaced as ExternalObjectRef for alert aggregation.
